job_history.work_description: Responsible for answering incoming calls from customers while ensuring a high level of customer service and maximizing productivity. Direct phone-based customer interaction to answer and resolve a wide variety of inquiries including but not limited to pharmacy benefits, mail order and pharmacy assistance calls. Assists customers /pharmacies/physicians with orders and reorders, benefit eligibility questions and prescription inquiries. Escalates drug related calls to appropriate pharmacist. Assist pharmacies and members on all issues related to processing of pharmacy claims. Determines appropriateness of overriding pharmacy claims edits and error messages. Coordinates internal resolution of claims exceptions and other issues. Assists with entering new prescription orders into system. Educates customers on benefits, use of plan, formulary, premiums and status of orders, claims and inquiries.

Inspect and test malfunctioning medical or related equipment, following manufacturers' specifications and using test and analysis instruments. Test or calibrate components or equipment, following manufacturers' manuals and troubleshooting techniques, using hand tools, power tools, or measuring devices. Perform preventive maintenance or service, such as cleaning, lubricating, or adjusting equipment. Examine medical equipment or facility's structural environment and check for proper use of equipment to protect patients and staff from electrical or mechanical hazards and to ensure compliance with safety regulations. Research catalogs or repair part lists to locate sources for repair parts, requisitioning parts and recording their receipt. Solder loose connections, using soldering iron.

Read and Interpret schematic drawings, diagrams, blueprints, specifications, work orders or reports to determine material requirements or assembly instructions. Assembled electrical or electronic systems or support structures and installed components, units, subassemblies, wiring, or assembly cases, using rivets, blots, hand tools power tools and measuring devices. Explained assembly procedures or techniques to other workers. Conferred with supervisors or engineers to plan or review work activities or to resolve production problems.

Achieved work standards by following production, productivity, quality, and customer service standards; resolved operational problems; Identified work process improvements. Accomplished work requirements by orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, and coaching 20+ employees. Conferred with other supervisors to coordinate operations and activities within or between departments. Enhanced department and organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; explored opportunities to add value to job accomplishments.

Handled customer questions, complaints, and billing inquiries with the highest degree of courtesy and professionalism to resolve customer issues with a one call resolution. Communicated with customers using web based tools and demonstrated the proficiency in typing and grammar. Made financial decisions to protect/ collect revenue and adjust the customer account. Assisted call center manager in assisting customer service representatives in handling escalations and difficult customer concerns.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in customer-facing roles, handling a wide variety of inquiries, and resolving customer issues with a high level of professionalism.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Proven ability to effectively communicate with customers, colleagues, and supervisors through various channels, including phone, web-based tools, and in-person interactions.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Demonstrated ability to resolve operational problems, handle escalations, and make financial decisions to protect revenue and adjust customer accounts.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Experience as a Production Team Lead, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, and coaching employees, and conferring with supervisors to coordinate operations.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Ability to manage time effectively, prioritize tasks, and meet productivity standards in various roles.

skills.name: Technical Troubleshooting
skills.explanation: Experience as a Medical Device Repair Technician, inspecting and testing malfunctioning equipment, and performing preventive maintenance or service.

skills.name: Electronics Assembly
skills.explanation: Experience as a Field Electronics Technician, assembling electrical or electronic systems, and installing components, units, or subassemblies.

skills.name: Logistics and Supply Chain Management
skills.explanation: Post-secondary training certificate in Logistics and Supply Chain Management, but limited practical experience in this area.
